revised_title: Solute Dispersion in Laminar Tube Flow: Analytical and Numerical Solutions
tldr: The authors present an analytical solution for the dispersion of a solute in a fully developed laminar tube flow. They use the diffusion-convection equation and eigenvalue-eigenvector methods to calculate local and mean concentrations. The results are compared with previous analytical and experimental studies, showing good agreement in the region of common validity.
scientific_discipline: Environmental and Earth Sciences > Fluid Dynamics
